you need speed to get quality and

Speed and quality is the most efficient

they measure stability and throughput
stability is a measure of the quality of

and the efficiency with which we can
produce work of that quality together
they represent a truly generic measure
of the effectiveness of our approach

measured by

first and most important we're not
really short of

Base outside of their own
